title: Applaud for Happiness - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Black Belly   Confident Protagonist   Confinement   Episodic   Family Conflict   First Love   Futuristic Setting   Handsome Male Lead   Male Yandere   Modern Day   Obsessive Love   Politics   Possessive Characters   Power Couple   Seduction   Showbiz   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping

description: The MC is a quick transmigrator and the ML each time is someone who has a sad past and painful experiences. The MC goes through multiple worlds and his mission is to help the ML achieve happiness, providing him with love, care, family, and guiding him towards a more fulfilling life~>
